body_html:
I am affected by this issue. Just spend an hour or two trying to get variable.scatter to work. Feels like a complete waste of time since this could be something very straightforwardly documented.

Jumping around the source and seeing only error messages from the C level is also not helping.

I am affected by this issue. Just spend an hour or two trying to get variable.scatter to work. Feels like a complete waste of time since this could be something very straightforwardly documented.

Jumping around the source and seeing only error messages from the C level is also not helping.
